caption.title: Map of Annob√≥n indicating Eidolon helvum colonies and sampling sites.
caption.p: Key: Circles indicate colony locations (open circle: colonies were reported or used to exist in the past, but no bats were found; partially filled circle: colony observed, but not sampled; filled circle: colony observed and sampled). Squares indicate sites where Eidolon bats have been observed feeding at different times of the year.
